title: 2 Minor Issues I would like to have noticed on Warring Kingdoms Nidalee

embed.description: Full animated 3D models for LoL champion Warring Kingdoms Nidalee, try all of the skins!

body:
1- I was looking at the skin here, and I am noticing that Nidalee's face and front are pale, but then when you look at her back she looks like she got sunburned or a tan. her ears look a bit darker than her face as well, but will ignore that one.

2- The second thing is that her face looks a little gaunt compared to her default skin, so I was wondering if that was intentional or not.

replies.body: That is odd, that her back and front are so different in skin tone. you can see it more clearly if you look from underneath, there's an obvious seam.
Thanks for the feedback! I've gone ahead and passed it onto the team!
Thank you! This is what I was hoping gets done about it at least!

I've also noticed that. her chest and face are pale, but her back has more of a pink color to it and you can see where it shifts on her shoulder during some of her animations. was wondering if thats intentional or........
I guess she could be getting a tan on her back from going down on all 4's to transform or track something. :/

Its possible i mean.. even the way she runs exposes more of her back to the sun could be intentional tanning or something, i just want to know cause it isn't like that in her Maid, snow bunny, bewitching skins and in the Egyptian skin her back matches her front as well... but more tan...and then that area is covered in her head hunter skin. I'm planning on buying it anyway... i just want to know one way or another lol
As am I, but I want riot to notice it.
